cause.description:
All donations go to the Chris Farley Foundations Inc. The foundation seeks to educate the public on the damaging effects of drug and alcohol abuse.
1. We need to communicate the consequences of drug and alcohol abuse.
2. We all need to step back and look at the bigger picture... drug and alcohol abuse effect friends and family of the abusers
3. Let abusers know that their is help out there.
cause.mission: seeks to educate the public on the damaging effects of drug and alcohol abuse.
cause.name: Effects of Drug and Alcohol Abuse
